Container.Name: AirSnap
Container.Overview: Creates snapcast clients for any airplay device!
Container.Description:
Make sure network is host to see airplay devices (or tell me how to fix this in support thread). Go to the Web UI. Have fun.
This adds like 9-10 seconds of lag to the stream for pause/play. Voume remains instant.
To deal with the added lag, set the latency of your NON-AIRPLAY snapcast clients to NEGATIVE the milliseconds of latency, so 9-10 seconds might be -9400.
Supports controlling homepod volume via snapcast. Doesn't detect changes to volume to homepod (yet) help appreciated. No metadata support yet either.
